channel.title: Chatbox Fix
channel.description:
i recently added separate crowns for my server and they all my added crowns work perfect moderator, donor, super donor, extreme donor, and admin. The owner crown works 50%, all the players see the correct crown but you yourself instead of seeing the owner crown you see an admin crown, any ideas on how to fix? I can post methods/code if you need.
Edit: I've been at this for hours and i cannot figure it out, i would really appreciate some help so i can get this error over with. Thanks!
